actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to delay for one year the effective date of the changes made by the Tax Reform Act of 1976 in the minimum tax on individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to delay, for one year, the implementation of the Tax Reform Act's increased minimum tax on tax preferences for non-corporate individuals.

titles.title: A bill to delay for one year the effective date of the changes made by the Tax Reform Act of 1976 in the minimum tax on individuals.
